otherNightReminder: Remove any 'No Ability' Reminder token. Put the 'No Ability' Reminder on any Townsfolk with any 'Trade' Reminder token on them. Wake each player with a 'Trade' Reminder on them and tell them they have received the Potions of the player with the corresponding 'Trade' Reminder on them.
name: Solicitor
ability: 2 living players may choose to trade all potions, and Townsfolk that do lose their ability till dawn. If either player is dead when the trade would happen, no trade occurs and no player loses their ability.
